summary: A wrapper class for automatic speech recognition models that generates time-aligned transcription outputs. It abstracts model-specific details for CTC and RNNT architectures, handles probability suppression, token-to-word conversion, and formats results into CTM units, while also providing utilities for preparing training, validation, and test datasets.
business_intent: Enable downstream applications such as subtitle creation, speech analytics, and alignment‑based model training by delivering accurate word‑level timing information from ASR systems.
